channel.title: Radio TFS
channel.itunes:subtitle: Check in and Check out
channel.itunes:author: Paul Hacker, Mickey Gousset and Martin Woodward
channel.itunes:summary: A show about all things related to Microsoft Visual Studio Team System and Microsoft Visual Studio Team Foundation Server
channel.description: A show about all things related to Microsoft Visual Studio Team System and Microsoft Visual Studio Team Foundation Server

item.title: Radio TFS 02: TFS 2008 What's New and Should You Upgrade
item.itunes:author: Paul Hacker, Mickey Gousset, Martin Woodward
item.itunes:subtitle: What is new in Team Foundation 2008, should you upgrade?
item.itunes:summary: This week talk about the new Team Foundation Server 2008, discussing what is new and why you would want to upgrade. We also introduce the new co-host, Martin Woodward
item.itunes:keywords: tfsradio, tfs, vsts, visual studio, team system, team foundation server, build, mvp

item.title: Radio TFS 01: Team Build 2008
item.itunes:author: Paul Hacker and Mickey Gousset
item.itunes:subtitle: What is new in Team Foundation Build 2008
item.itunes:summary: This week we talk about the new build functionality in Team Foundation Server 2008, as well as introduce ourselves.
item.itunes:keywords: tfsradio, tfs, vsts, visual studio, team system, team foundation server, build, mvp
